title: TPA Nunu

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
At the start of this year my mate offered to buy me a skin, to my delight i asked for TPA Nunu and was more than disappointed when i saw the in-game result. This skin is more than horrifying, please riot could you just re-work Nunu and his skins! I mean just look at it...
I know i can't do any better but P.L.E.A.S.E
